entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 8:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: E 45 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
